hero.title: Escape to
hero.subtitle: Paradise
hero.description: Experience the ultimate beach camping adventure where the ocean meets the stars.

about.heading: About Us
about.title: Nature's Best Kept Secret
about.p1: Nestled along the pristine coastline, CoastalCamp offers a unique blend of rugged adventure and serene relaxation. Wake up to the sound of waves, spend your days surfing or sunbathing, and end your nights with stories around a crackling bonfire under a blanket of stars.
about.p2: Whether you're a seasoned camper or looking for a comfortable glamping experience, our site provides the perfect backdrop for making unforgettable memories.

amenities.heading: Our Amenities
amenities.title: Comfort Meets Nature
amenities.tents_desc: Spacious glamping tents with comfortable beds.
amenities.bonfire_desc: Community and private fire pits for evening gatherings.
amenities.bbq_desc: Fully equipped grilling stations for your catch of the day.
amenities.surf_desc: Boards and wetsuits available for all skill levels.
amenities.wifi_desc: Stay connected even in the wild (at the main lodge).
amenities.coffee_desc: Fresh local brew served every sunrise.
amenities.parking_desc: Secure parking spots for all our guests.
amenities.music_desc: Acoustic sessions every weekend by the beach.

contact.desc: Experience the perfect getaway where the sand is your seat and the ocean is your view. Book your stay with us and reconnect with nature in style.
contact.heading: Contact Us
